content: from doctor who everyone s favorite robot dog k-9 in doily form i designed this pattern for filet crochet but because it is a chart you may also use it for knitting or other needle arts the chart including one square border is 44 x 34 squares this is the small version i also have posted the pattern for a much larger version please give me credit if you post or link elsewhere for more information see http //community livejournal com/crafty_tardis/62127 html
